title: WHY LUDENS WHY!
body:
I died (Ingame and mentally) when I was playing {{item:3089}}  {{champion:41}}  and {{item:3285}}  didn't work with his Q. 
How will I live up to ~~Deathfire Grasp~~ GP. 
How will I play GP with 800 AP and 460 movement speed. 
HOW CAN I SHIP {{item:3087}} x{{item:3285}} . 
**HOW WILL I ONE SHOT FOOLS!?!?**
{{item:3070}} **WHY!!!!**{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Sucks big time. I love the static + ludens combo too, especially on Twisted Fate. The reason it doesnt work for dankplank is because his q is treated as a **melee basic attack** and basic attacks obviously don't  proc ludens. {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Musterpulse,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=B7sPzW5O,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-15T21:16:29.120+0000)
>
> Sucks big time. I love the static + ludens combo too, especially on Twisted Fate. The reason it doesnt work for dankplank is because his q is treated as a **melee basic attack** and basic attacks obviously don't  proc ludens. {{item:3070}}

they do on fizz with his w passive the passive not active

That's because Fizz's W passive is a spell that empowers basic attacks (thus applying both on-hit and on-spell effects), GP's Q is counted as a melee basic attack but not a spell (in regards to game mechanics).
Luden's Wrecko really does't work with his Q? that makes me sad. its a spell and all so how is it stopped?
It's stated in the ability description that it's counted as a melee basic attack, not a spell, hence why Luden's doesn't work with it.

Agreed.
The diversity should be an option.
GP's Q applies on hit effects, not spell effects. Ezreal's Q applies both.

> GP's Q applies on hit effects, not spell effects. 
> Ezreal's Q applies both.

Ez Q doesnt apply Rylai slow (Spell Effect) nor can it Critically strike (On Hit) so it is a bit fussy.
Maybe the reason Ezreal's Q doesn't apply crits is because they're not on-hit effects.
Well if they aren't on hit affects then you got me, I don't know.
